trait.name: Natural Athlete
trait.text: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

trait.name: Stone's Endurance
trait.text: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Powerful Build
trait.text: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

trait.name: Mountain Born
trait.text: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Giant.
